  "cn": 9,
  "range": "Special",
  "target": "Special",

  "description": "Your maw distends horrifically before you vomit a stream of diseased filth. You immediately make a Breath attack. This counts as a magic missile with Damage equal to your Toughness Bonus, and it ignores Armour Points. The attack also has the Corrosive and Poison Traits. Any target taking more Wounds than their Toughness Bonus must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or contract Blood Rot.",
